snippet: On the eve of the release of his new album, “Heroes,” Willie Nelson and his 23-year-old son, Lukas, who is featured on nine of its tracks, talked about the family business.
lead_paragraph: On the eve of the release of his new album, “Heroes,” Willie Nelson and his 23-year-old son, Lukas, who is featured on nine of its tracks, talked about the family business.

headline.seo: Willie Nelson’s New Album, ‘Heroes,’ Features His Son Lukas
headline.main: A Next-Generation Offering From Willie Nelson
headline.print_headline: A Next-Generation Offering From Willie Nelson
